name: Inception Dark
description:
Dark theme for the Chrome Stylish editor.

  • Monokai
  • Ambiance
  • LightTable

The new update to stylish adds its own themes feature, this only effects the editor box.

This theme effects all the components of stylish, giving you a nice and consistent editing experience.

https://github.com/Hippyjake/HippyjakesUserStyles/
